item.text:
I have been committed to developing [[Critical]] [[Creative]], independent individuals, teams and organisations in my work as a teacher, manager, coach and consultant.  
I believe that the greater the increase in the rate of learning, the greater the improvement in performance at an individual, team, manager and organisational level.
